        static <SEG,S> Codec<StyledSegment<SEG,S>> styledSegmentCodec(Codec<SEG> segCodec,
                                                              Codec<S> styleCodec)

      • styledTextCodec

        static <S> Codec<StyledSegment<String,S>> styledTextCodec(Codec<S> styleCodec)
        A codec which allows serialisation of this class to/from a data stream. Because S may be any type, you must pass a codec for it. If your style is String or Color, you can use STRING_CODEC/COLOR_CODEC respectively.

      • listCodec

        static <T> Codec<List<T>> listCodec(Codec<T> elemCodec)
